palath palana mathiwaranaya pawathwa sathiyaka kalayak gathawana witath aanduwa pilibanda thiranayakata paminimata janapathiwaraya asamathwi thibima nisa rate yam asthawara bhawayaka lakunu pahalawi thibe .me thathwaya udawuye mathiwaranaye prathathipalaya nisa nowe ,mathiwaranayata pera janapathi kala pramakashaya nisaya .enam mathiwaranyen pasuwa dushithayan nathi aanduwak hadana bawata kala prawakashayayi .me prakakashayata galapena janda pranathipalayak labi thibe .janathawa wisin agamathiwarayage nayakathwaya prathikshepa kara athibawata dan mathayak godanagi thibe .samanyana wyaawastha nithiya anuwa palathpalana jandayak hethuwen agamathi illa aswimata awashyapa nowe .namuth janapathi ge ihatha pragakashaya prathakarawa agamathi pranathikshepa kalabawata mathaya godanagi thibe .janapathi prekashakala aakarayata rate sanwardhanaya kirimath ,horu allimath sidukirimata nohakiwuye agamathige krinayakalapaya hethuweni .eya janathawa thula kawduna adahasak bawa janda prithipalayen sanathawe .janapathi kalin kiyasitiye pebarawari 11 wanida sita thaman wada patanganna bawayi .namuth dan 18 wadath pahuwi thibe .peni yana aakarayata prabashnaya wi thibenne agamathi thanathuren illa aswimata sudanam nowimayi .
